We are EKOA.

EKOA is an international association of like minded people.

If you can say yes to all of these:-
  • You are an introvert.
  • You are irreligious.
  • You think that you have high potential.
  • You are weird, eccentric even, and proud of that.
  • You are uninterested in casual sex.
  • You have or used to have a superiority complex, with a touch of narcissism.
You qualify! Consider youself a member.
